ygData.subject: Re:  Purity belt...SPOILER REQUEST
ygData.msgSnippet: There was a guy like this on Veeshan last night in crush - folks like that are gonna give barding a bad name. Not only had he a full set of bronze/steel, and a
ygData.messageBody:
There was a guy like this on Veeshan last night in crush - folks like that
are gonna give barding a bad name.

Not only had he a full set of bronze/steel, and a claw - we was CONSTANTLY
auctioning for a blackened iron crown, mistmoore drum, etc.

He was set (of course) to anon.

I challenged him about it and his response was "I gave up my ranger dude -
want me to just dump his stuff?"

Not only was he powerleveling - he hadn't the slightest idea HOW to be a
bard. He told me that "I screwed up" by not dumping all xtra points into
str - when I asked him if that bronze wasn't a bit heavy for a bard.

I informed him that no, str wasn't gonna be our primary stat - he was still
clueless. I'm sure he thinks he can solo tank - also sure he'll say
'barding sucks' in just a few more levels.

Watched him run around most of the night, not sure what level he was - but
he was still runnin from cents.

I guess his idea of a bard is a tank that can sing *sigh*.

The other day - this lvl 1 runs up to me, basically DEMANDS I find her
corpse (it was in the newbie zone, nearly in plain sight) - I almost choked
when I saw her putting on a complete set of steel.

Maybe I have a vicious streak - but it does my heart good to see both their
bodies on the ground (something that happens with a LOT more regularity
than I would have suspected).

I'd like to see anon not be available to anyone under lvl 10 or so - would
show these guys up for what they really are. *MY* idea of helping out a
new character is patchwork, or *gasp* leather, hahaha - silly me.


At 10:41 AM 7/14/99 -0500, you wrote:
> Hello all, I've heard many Looking to buy's but I don't believe
>I've ever actually noticed anyone wearing it. He said a friend gave
>it to him, nice gift. No sooner had his new character spawned at the
>Freeport gates than some lvl 20+ came up and handed him a FS Rapier, asked
>if he wanted a 2H instead and then waved and ran off almost before I could
>tell him how to say thank you. I guess I'm just bent because my bank
>account hovers between 5 and 20pp constantly so there's no way I could buy
>plate or any other really cool items yet. Weiland the Extremely Poor
>Bard of Freeport Erollisi Marr
